articles.author: Vansh Agarwal
articles.title: Trump's policies are fueling boycotts of American goods in Europe (NYSEARCA:PBJ) - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: European consumers boycott American brands amid declining U.S. sentiment during Trump's term. Learn the impact on companies & markets.
articles.content:
miniseries/E+ via Getty Images
